name: Tokyoh's "DoodleVerse"
description:
A procedurally generated open-world sandbox experience with hidden boss dungeons, character customization, RPG level scaling, online multiplayer and more!

EXPLORE a WORLD that is ALL YOUR OWN!

-With procedurally generated landscapes, enemies and items, everyone's DoodleVerse is different! You could have weapons, wings, armor or even bosses that DON'T exist in other player's DoodleVerse! Raid other player's worlds to gain useful things your game may have NEVER generated!

-Planned support for procedurally generated BIOMES, with a base build of snowy, desert, jungle, hills, and ocean biomes!

CUSTOMIZE your BUNNY!

-hundreds of different item equipments ranging from armor and wings to weapons and more! 

-Custom online nicknames and Bunny Badges!

-Planned support for different animated skins!

CHALLENGE your FRIENDS!

-Create lobbies and custom rooms for you and your friends to join! Grind together and collect items, defeats mobs, or even fight each other and raid opponents dungeons! Everyone's boss dungeons are different!

-RuneScape like level scaling! Become the most powerful Doodler with strong player equipment, a high level and lots of PowerUp Carrots!

NOTE: THIS IS VERY EARLY IN DEVELOPMENT, ALPHA STAGES. THIS IS NOTHING MORE THEN THE PARTIALLY DONE FRAMEWORK FOR A GAME I AM DEVELOPING STRICTLY FOR FEEDBACK FROM PLAYERS, BUG AND GLITCH REPORTS, SUGGESTIONS AND OFFERS OF JOINING THE DEV TEAM, which is currently only ME!!!  SO IF YOU WANNA HELP BUILD THE NEXT LEGENDARY SANDBOX EMAIL ME - doodlebunniesnft@outlook.com

NOTE: ONLY SUPPORTED ON FULL HD/1920 X1080 DEVICES. PLEASE LEAVE YOUR EXPERIENCE IN THE COMMENTS! PLEASE REPORT ANY BUGS FOUND! AND PLEEEEEAAASE SEND ME ANY IDEAS YOU WOULD LIKE TO SEE! YOUR EXPERIENCE IS DIFFERENT THAN EVERYONES!

-Planned support for controllers.

-Planned support for local multiplayer/split screen.

-Planned support for MacOS, Linux, Android, iOS, and Nintendo Switch.
